Column.Name: Completion Date
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( $thisValue > TODAY(), "Completion Date must be before today", TRUE)

Column.Name: Treatment Overall Due Date
Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: NOT([RecordID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Consequence ID Array]))
NOT([Cause ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Cause ID Array]))
NOT([Risk ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Risk ID Array]))
[Risk ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Risk ID Array])
[Cause ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Cause ID Array])

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUPALL( "Register Name", "Risk - Treatment", "[Treatment ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Treatment ID]) );
RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT($data)
